////////////////////////////////////////Testing coin_dispenser///////////////////////////////////////////////////
//Input: amount_to_return 10'b; return 1'b signal to start returning change 
//Outputs: 3'b - coin to return penny(001), nickel(010), dime(011), quarter(100), half-dollar(101), dollar(110)
//format: amount_to_return(xxxxxxxxxx), coin_to_return(xxx), amount_left 10'b (xxxxxxxxxx) ----> xxxxxxxxxx_xxx_xxxxxxxxxx

//Testing dispensing each type of coin as change
0000000000_000_0000000000 //Test 1

//penny
0000000001_000_0000000000 //Test 2
0000000000_001_0000000000 //Test 3
0000000000_000_0000000000 //Test 4

//nickel
0000000101_000_0000000000 //Test 5
0000000000_010_0000000000 //Test 6
0000000000_000_0000000000 //Test 7

//dime
0000001010_000_0000000000 //Test 8
0000000000_011_0000000000 //Test 9
0000000000_000_0000000000 //Test 10

//quarter
0000011001_000_0000000000 //Test 11
0000000000_100_0000000000 //Test 12
0000000000_000_0000000000 //Test 13

//half-dollar
0000110010_000_0000000000 //Test 14
0000000000_101_0000000000 //Test 15
0000000000_000_0000000000 //Test 16

//dollar
0001100100_000_0000000000 //Test 17
0000000000_110_0000000000 //Test 18
0000000000_000_0000000000 //Test 19

//Testing the dispensing when the amount to return was $1.91

0010111111_000_0000000000 //Test 20
0000000000_110_0001011011 //Test 21

0001011011_000_0000000000 //Test 22
0000000000_101_0000101001 //Test 23

0000101001_000_0000000000 //Test 24
0000000000_100_0000010000 //Test 25

0000010000_000_0000000000 //Test 26
0000000000_011_0000000110 //Test 27

0000000110_000_0000000000 //Test 28
0000000000_010_0000000001 //Test 29

0000000001_000_0000000000 //Test 30
0000000000_001_0000000000 //Test 31



//Testing the dispensing when the amount to return was the max amount $9.99
1111100111_000_0000000000 //Test 32
0000000000_110_1110000011 //Test 33

1110000011_000_0000000000 //Test 34
0000000000_110_1100011111 //Test 35

1100011111_000_0000000000 //Test 36

0000000000_110_1001010111 //Test 39
